comments: Moved to Japan from Taiwan and took a Japanese name.  As yet no new plant names as K. Kyoda but articles concerning Grasses e.g. J. Jap. Bot., 63(3): 102-111 (1988).
examples: Thaumastochloa chenii C.C. Hsu in Taiwania, 16(2): 216 (1971).
source: Japanese alternative name from JeF Veldkamp.
